Summary Note:
The RM has known Katriina Liisa Ahonen since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
Katriina Liisa Ahonen is a 43 year old Investment Director from Finland.
After extensive research, she chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Katriina Liisa Ahonen is currently widowed. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Katriina earned her secondary school diploma from Helsingin Ranskalainen Koulu in 2001.
She then attended Aalto University, which she graduated in 2005.
Occupation History:
Katriina Liisa Ahonen is a 43 year old Investment Director from Finland. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Katriina Liisa Ahonen launched her career as a Analyst at Intera Partners Oy, where she gained valuable experience from 2006 to 2009.
In 2009, she moved to Intera Partners Oy to work as a Associate, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Her tenure as a Investment Director at CapMan Oyj from 2014 till now was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 360000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has flat located in Vaasa, worth 880000 EUR.

She purchased flat in Kauniainen, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 550000 EUR.
On top of that she inherited a beautiful flat in Porvoo, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 850000 EUR.

Following the passing of her grandmother, a successful Neurosurgeon, she received an inheritance of 1600000 EUR in 2015, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome her as a new client.
